hero_carousel.book_description: Discover the proven framework that has helped hundreds of professionals break through self-doubt and take decisive action in their careers and lives.
hero_carousel.coaching_description: Break through barriers, overcome self-doubt, and achieve the success you deserve with personalized one-on-one coaching.
hero_carousel.mentor_subtitle: Elevate Your Coaching Practice to New Heights
hero_carousel.mentor_description: Fast-track your ICF certification and build a thriving coaching practice with expert guidance and proven systems.
hero_carousel.mastermind_subtitle: Accelerate Your Growth with Like-Minded Professionals
hero_carousel.mastermind_description: Connect with ambitious professionals, share challenges, and achieve breakthrough results in our supportive mastermind community.

about_homepage.description1: I'm Monica Leggett, a Professional Certified Coach (PCC) with over 15 years of experience helping individuals and businesses transform their lives. My journey from self-doubt to confidence inspired me to help others break free from limiting beliefs.
about_homepage.description2: Through my proven 8-step framework, I've guided 500+ clients from feeling stuck and overwhelmed to living with clarity, confidence, and purpose. Whether you're seeking personal transformation, building a coaching practice, or looking for community support, I'm here to help you take decisive action.

services_homepage.book_description: Start your transformation journey with 'Doubtful to Decisive' - your roadmap to breaking through barriers and achieving your goals.
services_homepage.coaching_description: Get personalized one-on-one support to overcome challenges, set clear goals, and create lasting change in your life.

testimonials_homepage.name: Sarah M.
testimonials_homepage.title: Marketing Director
testimonials_homepage.quote: Monica's 8-step framework completely transformed how I approach challenges. I went from feeling stuck to landing my dream job!

testimonials_homepage.name: John D.
testimonials_homepage.title: Business Owner
testimonials_homepage.quote: The mastermind group gave me the accountability and support I needed to finally launch my business. Monica is an incredible facilitator.

testimonials_homepage.name: Lisa R.
testimonials_homepage.title: ICF Certified Coach
testimonials_homepage.quote: Monica's mentor coaching program fast-tracked my certification. Her guidance was invaluable in building my practice.

lead_magnet.title: Ready to Take Action? ðŸš€
lead_magnet.description: Download my free Action Guide and start your transformation today! Get the first 3 steps of my proven framework.

about_page.intro_text: Professional Certified Coach (PCC) with 15+ years of experience helping individuals and businesses transform their lives. Past ICF Chapter President (2019) and author of 'Doubtful to Decisive'.
about_page.credentials_list:
â€¢ Professional Certified Coach (PCC) through ICF
â€¢ ICF Connecticut Chapter President (2019)
â€¢ Author of 'Doubtful to Decisive: Eight Steps to Get Unstuck and Take Action'
â€¢ 500+ clients transformed
â€¢ 15+ years coaching experience
â€¢ Certified in PeopleMapâ„¢ and Positive Intelligence coaching
â€¢ Founded New Steps Life Coaching in 2007
about_page.philosophy_quote: I believe everyone has the answers within them â€“ sometimes you just need a skilled partner to help you uncover them.
about_page.personal_story: One of 10 children, I learned early how to communicate effectively and help others find their voice. Married for 37 years, I'm a mother and grandmother who understands the challenges of balancing personal and professional growth. My own journey from corporate burnout to purposeful living inspired me to help others make similar transformations.

contact_page.contact_intro: Ready to take the next step in your transformation journey? I'd love to hear from you. Whether you're interested in coaching, have questions about my book, or want to explore working together, don't hesitate to reach out.
contact_page.office_hours:
Monday - Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST
Friday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM EST
Weekends: By appointment only
contact_page.calendar_description: Ready to explore how we can work together? Book a complimentary 30-minute discovery call to discuss your goals and see if we're a good fit.

book_page.page_title: Doubtful to Decisive: Eight Steps to Get Unstuck and Take Action
book_page.subtitle: Transform Your Life with My Proven 8-Step Framework
book_page.book_description: This book is your roadmap from feeling stuck and overwhelmed to living with clarity, confidence, and purpose. Based on my 15+ years of coaching experience and the transformation of 500+ clients, this practical guide provides the exact framework you need to break through barriers and achieve your goals.
book_page.eight_steps_description:
1. Awareness - Recognize where you are
2. Acceptance - Embrace your current situation
3. Mindset - Shift your perspective
4. Assessment - Evaluate your options
5. Planning - Create your roadmap
6. Action - Take decisive steps
7. Completion - See it through
8. Reflection - Learn and grow
book_page.target_audience_list:
â€¢ Professionals feeling stuck in their careers
â€¢ Aspiring entrepreneurs ready to take the leap
â€¢ Anyone struggling with self-doubt and indecision
â€¢ Leaders wanting to inspire their teams
â€¢ Individuals seeking personal growth and transformation

personal_coaching_page.intro_text: Ready to break through barriers and achieve the success you deserve? My personalized one-on-one coaching provides the support, accountability, and proven strategies you need to transform your life and career.
personal_coaching_page.services_list:
â€¢ Career transitions and advancement
â€¢ Building confidence and overcoming self-doubt
â€¢ Work-life balance and stress management
â€¢ Goal setting and achievement strategies
â€¢ Communication and relationship skills
â€¢ Leadership development
â€¢ Personal growth and fulfillment
personal_coaching_page.process_steps:
1. Discovery Call - We'll explore your goals and challenges
2. Custom Plan - Together we'll create your personalized roadmap
3. Weekly Sessions - Regular support and accountability
4. Action Steps - Clear, achievable tasks between sessions
5. Progress Tracking - Celebrate wins and adjust as needed
6. Transformation - Achieve lasting, meaningful change

mentor_coaching_page.intro_text: Fast-track your ICF certification and build a thriving coaching practice with expert guidance. As a PCC and former ICF Chapter President, I provide the mentorship you need to elevate your coaching skills and grow your business.
mentor_coaching_page.icf_support_description: Whether you're pursuing your ACC, PCC, or MCC credential, I provide comprehensive support including recorded session reviews, competency development, performance evaluations, and exam preparation. My proven approach has helped dozens of coaches achieve their certification goals.
mentor_coaching_page.competencies_list:
â€¢ Foundation & Ethical Guidelines
â€¢ Establishing the Coaching Agreement
â€¢ Trust and Intimacy Development
â€¢ Coaching Presence
â€¢ Active Listening
â€¢ Powerful Questioning
â€¢ Direct Communication
â€¢ Creating Awareness
â€¢ Designing Actions
â€¢ Planning and Goal Setting
â€¢ Managing Progress and Accountability
mentor_coaching_page.program_details: Programs available: 10-hour ICF Mentor Coaching (group or individual), Business Building Bootcamp, Advanced Coaching Skills Workshop. All programs include personalized feedback, practice sessions, and ongoing support.

masterminds_page.intro_text: Accelerate your growth with a supportive community of like-minded professionals. Our masterminds combine group coaching, peer support, and accountability to help you achieve breakthrough results.
masterminds_page.benefits_list:
â€¢ Weekly 90-minute group coaching calls
â€¢ Hot seat problem-solving sessions
â€¢ Peer accountability and support
â€¢ Access to exclusive resources and tools
â€¢ Private online community
â€¢ Guest expert sessions
â€¢ Quarterly one-on-one check-ins
masterminds_page.structure_description: Groups of 8-10 professionals meet weekly via Zoom for 90 minutes. Each session includes wins and celebrations, hot seat coaching for 2-3 members, group discussion and brainstorming, and action commitments for the week ahead.
masterminds_page.guarantee: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you're not completely satisfied after your first month, we'll refund your investment in full.

learning_center_articles.title: Step 1: Awareness
learning_center_articles.description: Awareness is the first step to address change. When you are self-aware, you are more confident, get disappointed in yourself less, and become more creative.
